title: ExpressDigital Darkroom Core v8.90.1468 (The Joker)
description:
Ideal for Emerging Professionals, Advanced Amateurs or Digital Enthusiasts
>> Manage and archive images
>> Edit and enhance photos
>> Apply and make graphic templates
>> Create limitless print packages
>> Show customer presentations
>> Print to Windows printers
>> Sell photos on-line with ExpressDigital PhotoReflect.com
>> Print to professional labs with ExpressDigital Labtricity


Capture
* Supports (9) different flexible group photography workflows
* Direct capture with wired and wireless options
* Open any standard digital file, RAW and proprietary digital camera files 

Manage
* Automated data import wizard to catalog photos by school, group or event
* Synchronize data from multiple field computers
* Quick data import, proof, enhance and order entry workflow

Proof
* Auto create yearbook and directory digital fulfillment files
* Design composite sheets and custom proof layouts
* Apply edits to photos directly in the proofing windows

Enhance
* Create new photo products using borders, text, and overlay graphics
* Easily enhance photos with cropping, scaling and built-in color management
* Design your own composites and templates using the Border Workshop

Sell
* Auto print, order envelopes, slate cards, shoot sheets and stickers directly from the software
* Publish and sell photos online with your own PhotoReflect.com Internet storefront
* Show customer presentations including slideshow, star ratings, comparing photos side-by-side, and much moreÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¦

Print
* Print packages directly to the industry\&#039;s best digital mini-labs, dye-sub and ink jet printers with built in print drivers
* Print to file with user defined raster printing
* Print directly to professional labs on the ExpressDigital Labtricity network

have fun and enjoy The Joker
